root.name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho!
root.description: OverviewCard Captor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho! is a game developed and published by MTO for the Game Boy Color platform. Card Captor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho! is based on the anime series Card Captor Sakura and was never released outside of Japan.
